response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a high-value asset at a premium rate, tailored specifically for early adopters like yourself. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business or lifestyle. Kindly let me know if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 10000}
